channel.title: Adding Total level requirements, don't redirect me to a item require tut
channel.description:
[code]if(playerLevel[2] >= 99)[/code]
I'm looking to make a code like that, but I want it to require total level. I have tried this:
[code]if(playerTotal[1000] >= 99)[/code]
and that didn't work, but it was only a guess, someone please post the code.

item.title: Adding Total level requirements, don't redirect me to a item require tut
item.dc:creator: @Helbound Helbound
item.description:
@Helbound wrote:

Can’t find an int describing it, but I think this is it. Place it within a void:

totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]) + getSummonLvlForXP(summonXP)); I spent 2 seconds finding it, so I’m just passing by and trying to help, lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding Total level requirements, don't redirect me to a item require tut
